text: George Clooney's wealthy neighbours in the Alpine beauty spot of Lake Como say their Italian idyll is being ruined by the influx of hundreds of migrants to a makeshift camp on their doorstep. The picturesque area is best known as a hide - away for Clooney and a multitude of other Hollywood A - listers includ Brad Pitt, wife Angelina Jolie, and pop superstar Madonna. But a clamp - down by Switzerland on illegal immigrants entering the country from Italy threatens to turn this chic resort into a frontier town overrun by the homeless and desperate.
